name: Mimic (itch) (Firox)
description:
Why are these copies of you are chasing you ? You don't know but there is one thing which is sure, you must escape from these rooms.

In each level you must open the exit door and go in it in order to go to the next level. The level are platformer level. The particularity is that there are copies of yourself which will do the exact same actions than you. So, take care of your moves, they are right behind you.

This game has been created during the Weekly Jam 139.

Latest update:

- 10 levels

- some fixes

CREDITS:
